dmca.title: [ABUSE] Violation of Copyright and Intellectual Property - www.q-ro.net]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 29, 2005 12:27 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Violation of Copyright and Intellectual Property -
www.q-ro.net]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Tue Mar 29 00:21:39 2005
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001

11:39:59 -0600

helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from

abuseadm@theplanet.com; Fri, 25 Mar 2005 11:39:58 -0600

4.50) id 1DEsgK-0007Me-HW for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 25 Mar 2005
11:33:12 -0600
Received:         from mail.ragnarokonline.com ([38.144.73.130]
helo=ragusmail2.gravity.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
jmassenburg@ragnarokonline.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1DEsgB-00056K-Mt for
abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 25 Mar 2005 11:33:12 -0600
Content-class:         urn:content-classes:message
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C53160.5ECE180C"

Date:         Fri, 25 Mar 2005 09:30:42 -0800
Message-ID:
<C38080F31468AB44B8DBC27A84D4A65D1EA56E@ragusmail2.gravity.com>
X-MS-Has-Attach:         
X-MS-TNEF-Correlator:         
Thread-Topic:         Violation of Copyright and Intellectual Property -
www.q-ro.net
Thread-Index:         AcUwms1o5s+4ck2eRNG89sI5hE8mZAAxXNCw
From:         John Massenburg <jmassenburg@ragnarokonline.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
Received-SPF:         none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 38.144.73.130 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of ragnarokonline.com)
client-ip=38.144.73.130; envelope-from=jmassenburg@ragnarokonline.com;
helo=ragusmail2.gravity.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -97.9
Cc:         
Subject:         [ABUSE] Violation of Copyright and Intellectual Property -
www.q-ro.net
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.5
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -97.9



March 25 , 2005


Dear Sir/Madam,

Greetings, my name is John Massenburg from the Legal Department of Gravity
Interactive LLC, U.S. subsidiary of Gravity Corporation. Our department is
responsible for all intellectual property enforcement of Gravity Interactive
LLC and Gravity Corporation.

I am writing this letter to inform you that we have reasons to believe that
one of your clients may be illegally hosting a pirated version of our game
Ragnarok Online. I have tried contacting David Lessard who is the registered
owner of www.q-ro.net <http://www.q-ro.net> and I have yet to hear back from
him.

We ask that you 1) Contact Mr Lessard and inform him that Copyrighted and
Protected Intellectual Property is in question for www.q-ro.net
<http://www.q-ro.net>. and 2) Shutdown his servers if you cannot contact
him.

I am unsure of the proper ways to go about this, but if there is a formal
process in which we need to have these requests done, please reply to this
email.

Thank you for your time.



Very truly yours,









John Massenburg
Legal Department

Gravity Interactive LLC


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

=Pori
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
